alert.note: Alert for Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 19 at 6:50AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...GUSTY WINDS ALONG THE NORTH SHORE THIS MORNING... Strong drainage winds have developed this morning along the North Shore. The strongest winds are expected from Taconite Harbor to Grand Portage. Wind gusts of 35 to 45 mph are expected. The Grand Marais area has experienced wind gusts of 35 to 40 mph between 6 AM and 7 AM this morning. These strong winds will likely continue until late this morning, in the 10 AM to 11 AM timeframe. These winds will produce a strong crosswind for vehicles traveling Minnesota Highway 61 between Grand Portage and Taconite Harbor. The crosswind will be particularly hazardous for high- profile vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore
